features: Dove Men+Care Charcoal Purifying Shampoo cleanses and purifies your hair, leaving it visibly healthy.
This purifying shampoo is enriched with charcoal, clay, and effective plant-based cleansers for a deep clean.
Engineered for men, this charcoal shampoo has a 90% natural formula and leaves hair deeply cleansed and invigorated.
Start your day off right with earthy notes of nutmeg—a fresh scent that lasts up to 24 hours.
Dove shampoos are cruelty-free. Globally, we do not test on animals.
body.description: Harness the power of charcoal and clay, for deeply clarified, healthy hair. Dove Men+Care Charcoal Purifying Shampoo is 90% naturally derived and contains rich plant-based cleansers to give you the deep, refreshing clean you need. This Dove formula is enriched with deep-cleaning charcoal to leave your hair looking healthy and you feeling fresh, no matter what. Our charcoal shampoo is specifically engineered for men and strengthens your hair fiber for healthier, more resilient hair. Indulge your senses with earthy notes of nutmeg and a fresh scent that lasts up to 24 hours. Dove Men+Care Charcoal Purifying Shampoo is packed in a 100% recycled & recyclable plastic bottle—because we care about the planet. Directions for use: Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse. No visible flakes with regular use​. Since 2018, Dove has been globally accredited "Cruelty-Free" by the animal rights organization PETA (People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals) in recognition of the Dove global commitment to permanently end tests on animals everywhere in the world. Looking for more Dove Men+Care skin care products? Try the full range of Dove Men+Care products, including deodorants, antiperspirants, dry spray antiperspirant deodorants, body washes, face and body bars, and hair care products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really like this shampoo
reviews.reviewText: Leaves my hair clean and manageable without feeling oily. I had recently bought a different shampoo, not from Amazon, which said it was made with coconut milk. It was more like a conditioner than a shampoo and left my hair oily. I'm a big fan of Dove products in general.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Dove Men+Care Charcoal Purifying Shampoo offers a refreshing and effective cleansing experience. The infusion of charcoal helps remove impurities and oil, leaving hair feeling clean and revitalized. Its smooth texture make it a pleasant addition to my grooming routine, providing a satisfying lather for a deep clean. The scent smells like men cologne and is slightly too strong for me. I would prefer it to be unscented or more toward a neutral scent. Overall, a reliable choice for those seeking a quality shampoo with purifying benefits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is 2024 and we wash ourselves with clay and coal!
reviews.reviewText: I like the smell and it makes me clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo does a great job getting my boyfriends hair squeaky clean while leaving it moisturized and not dry. The smell is pleasant. A little goes a long way so this'll last awhile. It is a great value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells good keeps the hair clean!
reviews.reviewText: This bottle is huge, it's about as big as my cat, so it will last forever. I also like the smell of it, it has a fresh oceany scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lathers well on oily hair [DOVE MEN+CARE DV M SH Charcoal 4p 31z]
reviews.reviewText: DOVE MEN+CARE's Charcoal+Clay Purifying shampoo lathered really well on my oily hair and rinsed very cleanly. It's supposed to have "earthy notes of nutmeg and clay". I can detect a bit of the nutmeg, but not sure about what charcoal and clay are supposed to smell like. Either way, it's a nice scent, not overwhelming but I can still smell it on my long hair on the second day. For surfactants, this shampoo uses sodium laureth sulfate (sulfate from palm kernel oil or coconut oil) and cocamidopropyl betaine (not a sulfate from coconut), so I think that the claim that it is 90% naturally derived is true. I also like that the bottle is made from 100% recycled materials. At $9.99 for 31 oz, it's actually quite a decent price too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a giant bottle of shampoo that's for sure. I have long hair, and just a quarter sized amount had my hair nice and soft in one wash. I was kind of surprised how well it made my hair look just after that one wash! Less chemicals, more natural. That's exactly what you want in a shampoo. This stuff works great and I can highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes an incredible lather. Leaves hair feeling clean and fluffy with a nice scent
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo dispenses nicely out of smooth operating pump lid. The shampoo is almost perfectly clear but with a accent of gray to the medium weight gel. With a bit of water it makes a generous lather that makes washing any length of hair a breeze. It washes out of hair well leaving no residue feeling and when dry I noticed my hair feeling significantly lighter and fluffier. The scent while using is a moderate strength kind of refreshing men's cologne scent and after drying it is very minimal.
